message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's better for you to take this deal now, as the value of the money decreases faster for you in further rounds.
Alice, your offer was a bit too greedy for me. Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more this time considering the inflation disparity.
Bob, it's my turn now, and time is money! I'll take $55, leaving you with $45. This is a better deal than you'll get if you reject, as the value decreases rapidly for you.
